entities.name: doge
entities.description: Doge is mentioned as having tiny eyes that filled with sudden tears. He is also referred to as having written an obituary for the Daily Prophet.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as reading an obituary in the Daily Prophet and talking to Doge about it.

relationships.description: Doge wrote an obituary for the Daily Prophet, indicating that he published his work in this newspaper.
Harry read an obituary in the Daily Prophet, showing that he has a relationship with the newspaper through reading its content.
